strings:
<voice_0x01001CF0><se_high>Princess Medea: I'm so scared.
I can't stand living under a sky like this.
It's stained the colour of blood.

<voice_0x01001CF1><se_high>Princess Medea: Does this mean we're nearing the end of
our journey?
<voice_0x01001CF2><se_high>Princess Medea: Being cursed seems trivial compared to the thought of Rhapthorne ruling over the world.
<voice_0x01001CF3><se_high>Princess Medea: That's why you have to defeat him, <hero>. Everyone's lives are at stake.
<voice_0x01001CF4><se_high>Princess Medea: Do you think I'll return to my normal self if you win?
<voice_0x01001CF5><se_high>Princess Medea: Or do you think I'll have to spend the rest of my days as a horse?

<voice_0x01001CF6><se_high>Princess Medea: Once everything is peaceful again, I want to
travel the world together with you, <hero>. Even if the curse isn't lifted.
<voice_0x01001CF7><se_high>Princess Medea: Because that way, I won't have to marry that awful man...and lose you...
<voice_0x01001CF8><se_high>Princess Medea: I'd be happy to spend the rest of my life carrying you on my back, and taking you wherever you wanted to go, <hero>.

<voice_0x01001CF9><se_high>Princess Medea: If that happens...please take care of me.
I'd never leave your side. I promise.
